entry.title: Wednesday night: Showers or drizzle. Low plus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Showers or periods of drizzle beginning early this evening. Fog patches developing early this evening. Amount 2 to 4 mm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Wednesday 3 May 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Showers or drizzle. High plus 5 except temperature steady near plus 2 along parts of the coast.

entry.title: Thursday night: Rain showers or flurries. Low zero.
